name: Sparkletoad
description: It hops through meadows, leaving a trail of shimmering dust that is said to bring good luck.
3dModelPrompt: Generate a 3D model of a small, cute, cartoony toad Pokémon. It should have large, expressive eyes, smooth pastel pink and purple skin with sparkling spots, and a friendly smile. Style: Pokémon-like.

name: Boulderbug
description: Its shell is as hard as granite. It often tucks itself in, resembling a simple rock to avoid predators.
3dModelPrompt: Generate a 3D model of a cartoony bug Pokémon with a large, round, grey, rock-like shell covering most of its body. Small insect legs and antennae peek out. Eyes should be simple and black. Style: Pokémon-like.

name: Voltavix
description: Its fur crackles with stored electricity. When agitated, its tail sparks violently.
3dModelPrompt: Generate a 3D model of a cartoony fox Pokémon. It should have bright yellow fur with black lightning bolt markings, a bushy tail tipped with sparks, pointy ears, and a mischievous expression. Style: Pokémon-like.

name: Aquafin
description: Swims in schools, creating mesmerizing patterns with its synchronized movements.
3dModelPrompt: Generate a 3D model of a simple, cartoony fish Pokémon. Body shaped like a water droplet, translucent blue scales, large round eyes, and small fins. Style: Pokémon-like.

name: Floracub
description: A small sprout grows on its head, which blooms when it's happy. Loves basking in the sun.
3dModelPrompt: Generate a 3D model of a cute, cartoony bear cub Pokémon. Fur should be green, with leaf-like ears and a small flower sprouting from its head. Give it a gentle, sleepy expression. Style: Pokémon-like.

name: Pyrowisp
description: A floating flame with a mischievous consciousness. It's warm to the touch but phases through objects.
3dModelPrompt: Generate a 3D model of a cartoony, floating wisp Pokémon. It should look like a ball of fire (orange/red) with simple, glowing eyes and a playful, slightly transparent appearance. Style: Pokémon-like.

name: Cryoclaw
description: Its pincers are coated in thick ice, capable of freezing anything they grasp.
3dModelPrompt: Generate a 3D model of a cartoony crab Pokémon. Body should be icy blue, with large pincers covered in jagged, translucent ice shards. Give it sturdy legs and determined eyes. Style: Pokémon-like.

name: Aerowing
description: Catches thermal updrafts to soar for hours without flapping its broad, membrane wings.
3dModelPrompt: Generate a 3D model of a cartoony flying reptile Pokémon, similar to a pterodactyl but cuter. Smooth, light blue skin, large wings with membranes, a small crest on its head, and wide, curious eyes. Style: Pokémon-like.

name: Geopede
description: Burrows through soil at surprising speeds using its many legs, aerating the ground as it goes.
3dModelPrompt: Generate a 3D model of a large, cartoony centipede Pokémon. Body segmented, brown and earthy tones, with dozens of small legs. Head should have simple mandibles and small, beady eyes. Style: Pokémon-like.

name: Psybeam
description: Communicates through telepathy. The gem on its forehead glows when using psychic power.
3dModelPrompt: Generate a 3D model of a slender, cartoony humanoid Pokémon. Smooth purple skin, large head with big, black eyes, and a glowing pink gem on its forehead. Floating slightly off the ground. Style: Pokémon-like.
